title: Smoking Blind at Barry's Bachelor Party
itunes:title: Smoking Blind at Barry's Bachelor Party
description:
The week on The Cigar Authority we smoke a cigar known only by a number for Cigar Journal Magazine and we break down the latest issue.

In the second hour we light up the Don Benigno Petit Robusto as Barry’s bachelor party gets underway.

Live from the La Flor Dominicana Cigar Studio at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH we invite you to join the madness...
